Class Girl

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Mole
        • Girl

  • public class Girl
extends Mole
    This class is currently a stub and has not been implemented.

    This class is a particular kind of Mole. It is mostly a factory for making moles with the properties of a Girl. Distinct to this Mole are its sprites and its uptime and waiting and point values which are all set in the Globals class. It also overrides the basic mole kill() method to randomly reassign uptimes and wait times for when the mole spawns to a new Seat.

    The girl mole concept is introduced as a response to a balancing issue with button mashing. In a future version, the girl mole will penalize the player for hitting her.

    See Also:
    Mole, Seat, Globals, Mole.kill()
